entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near minus 2. Forecast issued 7:06 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain or snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 7:06 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
